page.title: 12Day in the life, Bridlington
page.content: My dad is a Tourist officer. The first thing he does when he gets to work is look through the post. He usually gets around twenty letters a day. Then he talks to the staff and tells them what to do. Then he answers complaints. He looks through the newspaper adverts and takes money from the people who want to advertise in the holiday guide. He then has lunch, sometimes with a newspaper reporter. After lunch he may design a poster which will be printed in Trinity Rd. There are over 300 poster sites in Bridlington. Over a million posters and leaflets are produced in a year. My dad's job is to sell Bridlinton, that means persuading people to come here for their holiday. Often he goes away to talk about Bridlington and he shows slides of the area.
